column4: hi could someone help me my wireless card doesnt light up i installed ndiswarraper along with the drivers and it all seemed to go ok.  im using a am1772 wireless card
Did you type "ndiswrapper -l" to make sure the driver was installed OK?
OK, type "more /etc/modules" and is ndiswrapper listed in that file somewhere?
OK then make sure that "iface wlan0 inet dhcp" is in your /etc/network/interfaces file, and you should then be able to go to menu System > Admin > Network and set up your wireless.
